grammar_name: 形容词比较级和最高级
description: 形容词比较级和最高级用来比较事物的性质、程度

basic_rules: 以辅音+y结尾，变y为i加-er/-est：happy → happier → happiest
以重读闭音节结尾，双写最后一个辅音字母加-er/-est：big → bigger → biggest
多音节形容词用more/most：beautiful → more beautiful → most beautiful
usage_cases: 比较级：A is taller than B.
最高级：A is the tallest in the class.
同级比较：A is as tall as B.
不同级比较：A is not as tall as B.
common_errors: He is more tall than me. (错误) → He is taller than me. (正确)
She is the most beautiful girl. (错误) → She is the most beautiful girl. (正确)
This book is more good than that one. (错误) → This book is better than that one. (正确)
usage_tips: 单音节和部分双音节形容词用-er/-est
注意不规则形容词的变化

sentences: Mary is the tallest in the class.
This book is more interesting than that one.
She is the most beautiful girl in the school.
He is as tall as his brother.

templates.question: She is the _____ girl in the class.
This book is _____ than that one.
He is the _____ boy in the class.

templates.sentence: He is more tall than me.
This book is more good than that one.

learning_objectives: 掌握形容词比较级和最高级的变化规则
能够正确使用比较级和最高级
了解不规则形容词的变化
能够在实际语境中正确使用比较级和最高级

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用比较级和最高级，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握比较级和最高级用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解比较级和最高级基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对比较级和最高级用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
